page.title: 12VILLAGE LIFE BY A NEWCOMER
page.content: VILLAGE LIFE BY A NEWCOMER Mr Mills, a retired navigator, moved into Wigmore some eight years ago. We asked him why he had chosen to retire to this area, and how he found living here. He said: "We lived in London and when I retired we decided to move to the country. We looked round for a house and we found one we liked in Wigmore. The house is called Abbots Lodge, after where we used to live in Abbots Langley. We loved the countryside so that made us want to move into the area." Mr Mills is now an active member of Wigmore Church and is the Church Warden. He loves walking and now knows the area very well.
